messages.subject: sorry for recent spam
messages.msgSnippet: This list has gotten really bad for it, I m afraid - a combination of longtime members getting spambotted and I suspect, people sending messages to all their
messages.messageBody:
This list has gotten really bad for it, I'm afraid - a combination of longtime members getting "spambotted" and I suspect, people sending messages to all their lists, groups, and friends in blanket emails. Grrr. As slow as things are otherwise, I'm tempted to switch the entire membership to moderation. As it is, anyone who posts blanket emails to the list goes on moderation, if they're not already (everyone starts out on moderation which cuts down some of this) and if anyone posts really blatant advertizing they're removed from the list.

In any case, if for some reason you want to reply to an off-topic post, do it directly to the poster, not the list.

Thanks, and my appologies again,
Meredith
